verses.text: \w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G1849"\w* higher \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w*, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* ordained \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* resisteth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, resisteth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ordinance|strong="G1296"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w*, purchase \w to|strong="G1849"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* damnation.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* princes \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* terror \w to|strong="G2309"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2309"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*. Wilt thou \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*? \w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1437"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* thee, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w fear|strong="G5399"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1437"\w* beareth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G1500"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1437"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w*: \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w avenger|strong="G1558"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w execute|strong="G4160"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w upon|strong="G1510"\w* \w him|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* doth \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w conscience’|strong="G4893"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G1510"\w* \w pay|strong="G5055"\w* tribute. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w ministers|strong="G3011"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, serving unto \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w purpose|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Render|strong="G0591"\w* therefore \w to|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w their|strong="G3956"\w* dues. Tribute, \w to|strong="G3956"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* tribute \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w*: \w custom|strong="G5056"\w*, \w to|strong="G3956"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w custom|strong="G5056"\w*: \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*, \w to|strong="G3956"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*: honour, \w to|strong="G3956"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* honour.

\w Owe|strong="G3784"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w any|strong="G3367"\w* thing, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w to|strong="G3784"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G3551"\w* loveth \w his|strong="G0025"\w* neighbour, hath \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* kill: Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* bear false witness: Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w covet|strong="G1937"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w it|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* comprised \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* thy neighbour \w as|strong="G5613"\w* thyself.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* our neighbour worketh \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*. \w Love|strong="G0026"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fulfilling \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w season|strong="G2540"\w*; \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w us|strong="G1537"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w rise|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w nearer|strong="G1452"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* passed, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w hand|strong="G1448"\w*. \w Let|strong="G3767"\w* us \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* cast off \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w put|strong="G1746"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* armour \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* honestly, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*: \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* rioting \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drunkenness|strong="G3178"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* chambering \w and|strong="G2532"\w* impurities, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* contention \w and|strong="G2532"\w* envy:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w put|strong="G1746"\w* ye \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w provision|strong="G4307"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* its concupiscences.
